taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek a-, without, coelo, hollow, and raphe, in reference to shape of the seed]

bio:treatment.discussion: Acoelorraphe is a widespread monotypic genus. The taxa A. wrightii forma inermis Hadacč and A. wrightii var. novo-geronensis Beccari probably have no biological significance.
Recent molecular studies indicated that Serenoa is the sister genus to Acoelorraphe (N. W. Uhl et al. 1995).

references.reference: Galeano-Garcés, G. 1986. Primer registro de dos géneros de palmas para la flora Colombiana. Mutisia 66: 1--4.
